Magnetic Chalkboard: Attach a small magnet to a piece of glass or wood and write on it with chalk to create a temporary, reusable writing surface.
Magnetic Plant Stand: Use a magnet to hold a small plant in place on a window sill or shelf, keeping it upright and stable.
Magnetic Wind Chime: Attach magnets to a metal rod or wire and hang it from a string or rope, creating a unique wind chime that produces different tones when the wind blows.
Magnetic Board Game: Use a magnetic surface to create a board game with magnetic pieces that can be moved around and interact with one another.
Magnetic Art Display: Use magnets to hold up artwork or photographs on a canvas or frame, creating a unique and modern display.
